services_intro.title: Services
services_intro.description: I focus on delivering high-quality web development services that solve real business problems. Each service is designed to provide clear value and measurable results.

services.name: Website Design & Development
services.what_it_is: Full-service website creation from initial concept through launch, including information architecture, visual design, frontend and backend development, content integration, and deployment.
services.who_its_for: Businesses launching a new web presence, companies outgrowing their current website, or organizations needing a complete redesign.
services.problem_it_solves: Eliminates the complexity of managing multiple vendors and ensures cohesive design and functionality.
services.what_you_get: A professional, responsive, SEO-friendly website that represents your brand and supports future growth.

services.name: Frontend Development
services.what_it_is: Implementation of user interfaces using React, Vue, or vanilla JavaScript with focus on performance, accessibility, and responsiveness.
services.who_its_for: Teams with existing backends, agencies needing development partners, or companies scaling frontend development.
services.problem_it_solves: Bridges the gap between design and functionality while maintaining clean, maintainable code.
services.what_you_get: Fast-loading, accessible, well-documented frontend code that works across all devices.

services.name: Backend & API Development
services.what_it_is: Server-side development, database design, API creation, authentication systems, and third-party integrations.
services.who_its_for: Businesses building web applications or requiring secure data handling and integrations.
services.problem_it_solves: Provides scalable, secure foundations for data-driven applications and automation.
services.what_you_get: Reliable backend systems that scale, integrate smoothly, and protect sensitive data.

services.name: Performance Optimization
services.what_it_is: Speed analysis, bottleneck identification, asset optimization, caching strategies, and database tuning.
services.who_its_for: Websites with slow load times or failing Core Web Vitals.
services.problem_it_solves: Improves load speed, SEO rankings, and user experience while reducing server costs.
services.what_you_get: A measurably faster website with improved performance metrics and user satisfaction.

services.name: Maintenance & Support
services.what_it_is: Ongoing support including updates, bug fixes, monitoring, backups, and technical consultation.
services.who_its_for: Businesses without in-house developers or needing a reliable technical partner.
services.problem_it_solves: Prevents security risks and ensures the website stays functional and up-to-date.
services.what_you_get: Peace of mind with continuous monitoring, backups, and quick issue resolution.

cta.title: Not sure which service you need?
cta.message: Let's discuss your project and determine the best approach based on your goals.
